mapper.select: select H.h_id, H.h_name, H.h_phone, H.h_email1, H.h_email2, H.deputy_name, H.deputy_phone, H.deputy_birth, H.deputy_department, I.h_code, R.room_code, I.hostInfo_name, I.h_sellerNum, I.h_accountNum, I.zipcode, I.roadAddress, I.numberAddress, I.restAddress, I.host_type, R.room_type, R.room_number, R.room_fee, R.able_checkIn, R.able_checkOut, R.title, R.content, R.room_status, R.min_number, R.max_number, R.bed_type, R.bed_count, R.bath_count, R.party_check, R.kitchen, R.wifi, R.parking, R.tv, R.refrigerator, R.hairdryer, R.washer, R.pet, R.pickup, R.dryer, R.elevator, R.barbecue, R.pool, R.aircon, R.heater, R.smoking, R.creDate, R.del_yn from h_host H inner join h_host_info I on H.h_id = I.h_id inner join h_room R on I.h_code = R.h_code where R.room_code = #{room_code};
mapper.update:
update h_host H inner join h_host_info I on H.h_id = I.h_id inner join h_room R on I.h_code = R.h_code
H.h_name = #{h_name},
H.h_birth_y = #{h_birth_y},
H.h_birth_m = #{h_birth_m},
H.h_birth_d = #{h_birth_d},
H.h_gender = #{h_gender},
H.h_phone = #{h_phone},
H.h_email1 = #{h_email1},
H.h_email2 = #{h_email2},
I.zipcode = #{zipcode},
I.roadAddress = #{roadAddress},
I.numberAddress = #{numberAddress},
I.restAddress = #{restAddress},
H.deputy_name = #{deputy_name},
H.deputy_phone = #{deputy_phone},
H.deputy_department = #{deputy_department},
H.deputy_birth = #{deputy_birth},
I.hostInfo_name = #{hostInfo_name},
I.h_sellerNum = #{h_sellerNum},
I.h_accountNum = #{h_accountNum},
I.host_type = #{host_type},
I.room_count = #{room_count},
R.room_type = #{room_type},
R.room_number = #{room_number},
R.room_fee = #{room_fee},
R.able_checkIn = #{able_checkIn},
R.able_checkOut = #{able_checkOut},
R.room_status = #{room_status},
R.title = #{title},
R.min_number = #{min_number},
R.max_number = #{max_number},
R.bed_count = #{bed_count},
R.bath_count = #{bath_count},
R.party_check = #{party_check},
R.kitchen = #{kitchen},
R.wifi = #{wifi},
R.parking = #{parking},
R.tv = #{tv},
R.refrigerator = #{refrigerator},
R.hairdryer = #{hairdryer},
R.washer = #{washer},
R.pet = #{pet},
R.pickup = #{pickup},
R.dryer = #{dryer},
R.elevator = #{elevator},
R.barbecue = #{barbecue},
R.pool = #{pool},
R.aircon = #{aircon},
R.heater = #{heater},
R.smoking = #{smoking},
R.content = #{content},
R.bed_type = #{bed_type},
R.del_yn = #{del_yn}
where R.room_code = #{room_code}
update h_room set del_yn = 'Y' where room_code = #{room_code}
